mapper.select: select r.review_no reviewNo, b.book_title bookTitle, r.user_no userNo, r.nickname, r.review_content reviewContent, r.style_no styleNo, r.emo_name emoName, r.likecnt, to_char(r.review_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') reviewDate from (select r.review_no, ru.likecnt, r.style_no, r.emo_name, r.user_no, r.book_no, r.nickname, r.review_content, r.review_date from (select r.review_no, s.style_no, e.emo_no, e.emo_name, r.book_no, u.user_no, u.nickname, r.review_content, r.review_date from review r, style s, emotion e, users u where e.emo_no = s.emo_no and r.style_no = s.style_no and r.user_no = u.user_no) r,(select review_no, count(review_no) likecnt from review_user group by review_no) ru where r.review_no = ru.review_no) r, books b where r.book_no = b.book_no and r.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY reviewDate asc
